Text.Page:
Our request for reinforcements from Allemantheia is being ignored, or delayed. Either way, we can't allow the wendigos to marshal their forces and attack us en masse.

Take out some of the {@LinkCreature:34#600#wendigo crushers}, {@LinkCreature:34#700#battlemasters}, and {@LinkCreature:34#500#frostweavers} or {@LinkCreature:34#800#icewalker arachnens} to keep the wendigos at bay. Whatever it takes.

We've got a reprieve, thanks to you.

You have my gratitude.
